text: {name1} found a fresh spring. {pronoun1_subj} quenched {pronoun1_poss} thirst.
{name1} tripped over a root, scraping {pronoun1_poss} knee.
{name1}, {name2}, {name3} and {name4} play ring around the rosie...
{name1}, {name2}, {name3} gang up on {name4}, attempting to beat {pronoun4_poss} senseless
{name1} attempts to heal by wrapping up {pronoun1_possa} their wounds.
